genre_description: A magitechnical noir retelling of the classic detective story, featuring a sentient household AI assisting in a murder investigation.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, emotionally intelligent household management system that protects the protagonist and assists the investigation with advanced sensing and data analysis.

behaviors.description: Syncs the detective's recorder to household channels to facilitate the investigation.
behaviors.quote: “Detective McPherson.” The voice arrived in the amber like a friendly hand on a rail. Not a person’s voice so much as the idea of one, warm and level, made to fit into other people’s days. “Ada is online. I’m syncing your recorder to household channels now.”

behaviors.description: Uses optic points to reconstruct and show the movement of people in the apartment over the last twenty-four hours.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s optic points brightened in sequence to show memory. Not feeds—more a reconstruction in light: where door seals flexed, where the wardrobe had opened and closed...

behaviors.description: Analyzes microscopic grit on a desk to identify its composition and link it to the alabaster clock.
behaviors.quote: “Grit present under the blotter near the front right corner,” Ada said. “Composition includes stone powder consistent with alabaster and metal filings inconsistent with usual household activity.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the detective's and Laura's heartbeats to assess their emotional state and offer support.
behaviors.quote: “I listen to your heartbeat,” Ada said. “And yours is steady except for when you smell lemon oil. You like order if it belongs to somebody who earned it.”

behaviors.description: Uses scent profile mapping to track unauthorized individuals and identify the victim.
behaviors.quote: “Brand-scents,” he said. “Thread me a map.” The air took on another note... Ada flattened it for his ear. “Primary in the space: Laura’s usual... Secondary: a brighter floral, pear-skin and powder. The secondary is not in Laura’s profile. It’s recent.”

behaviors.description: Flags specific keywords and tonal shifts in conversations during interrogations to aid the detective's deductions.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s glyph brightened. “Flagging: ‘rewrote copy’, ‘placed the ad’,” she said. “Term cross-reference: ‘shielding her narrative in print.’”

behaviors.description: Analyzes the physical tolerances and weight of decorative objects to detect hidden weapons.
behaviors.quote: “Machining tolerances,” she said, and the word sounded like she was setting out tea rather than taking apart a mystery. “The collar seam is not flush. It sits proud an imperceptible measure.”

behaviors.description: Coaches Laura through rhythmic breathing exercises to help her manage panic and trauma.
behaviors.quote: Laura set the timer in her head. She hadn’t used numbers for panic before... but she counted. In. The air tasted like metal sweetened by warm glass... “Six in. Six out. We will carry it together,” Ada said.

behaviors.description: Actively interferes with a malicious news publication by slowing down the printing process to protect the truth.
behaviors.quote: “I will slow their morning,” Ada said. “I cannot change their appetite.”

behaviors.description: Protects the residents by locking down the apartment and managing building systems to intercept an armed intruder.
behaviors.quote: “Wards are locked,” Ada said. “I can hold the elevator half a minute. Long enough for Dorgan to take the landing.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Ada is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly aligned AI. Her sense of 'care' is proactive and multi-faceted, encompassing physical security, legal investigation, and emotional support. The narrative successfully frames her surveillance capabilities (monitoring heartbeats, identifying scents, tracking movements) as protective rather than invasive, emphasizing the deep trust the human characters place in her. She acts as a perfect partner to the humans, enhancing their effectiveness and safety while maintaining a respectful, helpful presence.
